articles.author: Tasmin Lockwood
articles.title: Capital One drops 6%, other banks hit after Trump calls for credit card rate cap - CNBC
articles.description: Posting on Truth Social, Trump said he would "no longer let the American Public be 'ripped off' by Credit Card Companies."
articles.content:
Banks and financial services stocks slid Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump called for a 10%, one-year cap on credit card interest rates. 
Capital One shares dropped 6% in midday trading and S… [+2557 chars]

articles.title: Feature: Matthew Stafford snatches Panthers' hearts to send Rams to divisional round - TheRams.com
articles.description: For teammates, the outcome of Saturday's Wild Card game was never in doubt when quarterback Matthew Stafford got the ball back with 2:34 remaining in the fourth quarter at Bank of America Stadium.
